en: I think that cultural exchanges are important.
zh: 我认为文化交流很重要。

en: School violence is a big problem.
zh: 校园暴力是个大问题。

en: A stranger living nearby is better than a relative living far away.
zh: 远亲不如近邻。

en: Strangers close by are better than family far away.
zh: 远亲不如近邻。

en: Both of my parents are dead.
zh: 我的父母都去世了。

en: Both of my parents have passed away.
zh: 我的父母都去世了。

en: I doubt Tom will get here on time.
zh: 我怀疑汤姆会准时到达。

en: It's gotten dark.
zh: 天黑了。

en: It's become dark.
zh: 天黑了。

en: The only thing Tom likes to do after dinner is watch TV.
zh: 汤姆晚饭后唯一喜欢做的事情就是看电视。

en: The only place Tom has ever wanted to live is Boston.
zh: 汤姆唯一想住的地方是波士顿。

en: When are you going to return from Milan?
zh: 你什么时候从米兰回来？

en: Did you complete the work?
zh: 你完成工作了吗？

en: There's a water shortage in this area.
zh: 这个地区缺水。

en: Most car accidents happen because drivers aren't paying attention.
zh: 大多数交通事故的发生是因为司机没有注意。

en: I'm very tired now.
zh: 我现在很累。

en: I'm disappointed in you.
zh: 我对你很失望。

en: Stop bullying.
zh: 停止霸凌。

en: They say that a person who has perfect pitch can tell just by listening what pitch a note is.
zh: 据说有绝对音感的人只要听一下就能分辨出音高。

en: Let's get drunk today!
zh: 今天我们一醉方休吧！

en: He supposed that you would book seats.
zh: 他以为你会预订座位。

en: A lot of people living in our building don't like the owner.
zh: 我们楼里很多人不喜欢房东。

en: Have you seen a little girl with short black hair?
zh: 你有没有看到一个留着黑色短发的小女孩？

en: I'm too tired to do study.
zh: 我太累了，没法学习。

en: Are you sure you don't want to go with us?
zh: 你确定你不想和我们一起去吗？

en: You should make sure that you get there on time. Tom won't wait more than ten minutes if you are late.
zh: 你應該確保你準時到達。如果你遲到，湯姆不會等你超過十分鐘。

en: You should make sure that you don't make Tom angry.
zh: 你應該確保你不要惹湯姆生氣。

en: What did Tom expect Mary to do?
zh: 湯姆期望瑪麗做什麼？

en: We were unsure what kind of person Tom would be and whether he would like living in the same house as us.
zh: 我們不確定湯姆會是什麼樣的人，以及他是否會喜歡和我們住在同一間房子裡。

en: Tom's great-great-great grandmother lived in Scotland.
zh: 湯姆的曾曾曾祖母住在蘇格蘭。

en: Tom's favorite Elvis Presley song is "Jailhouse Rock."
zh: 湯姆最喜歡的埃爾維斯·普雷斯利歌曲是《監獄搖滾》。

en: Tom, Mary and John were playing tag on the playground.
zh: 湯姆、瑪麗和約翰在操場上玩捉迷藏。

en: Tom wrote a letter to Mary.
zh: 湯姆寫了一封信給瑪麗。

en: Tom would like to know the reason why Mary isn't here.
zh: 湯姆想知道瑪麗不在這裡的原因。

en: Tom wondered how many times Mary was going to run around the track.
zh: 湯姆想知道瑪麗會繞著跑道跑多少圈。

en: Tom wondered how many times Mary had been arrested.
zh: 湯姆想知道瑪麗被逮捕過多少次。

en: Tom wished he had put more money into that investment.
zh: 湯姆希望他能在那項投資上投入更多的錢。

en: Tom went to his high school reunion last week.
zh: 湯姆上週參加了他的高中同學會。

en: Tom went out of his way to help Mary.
zh: 湯姆特意去幫助瑪麗。

en: Tom went for a walk and took pictures of things he saw.
zh: 湯姆去散步，並拍下了他看到的東西。

en: Tom wasn't able to find a babysitter on such short notice.
zh: 湯姆在這麼短的時間內找不到保姆。

en: Tom was totally snockered before the party even began.
zh: 派對還沒開始，湯姆就已經喝得爛醉了。

en: Tom was the only one who saw Mary sneak into the room.
zh: 湯姆是唯一一個看到瑪麗偷偷溜進房間的人。

en: Tom was the first to arrive.
zh: 湯姆是第一個到達的人。

en: Tom was shocked to hear that Mary had died.
zh: 湯姆聽到瑪麗去世的消息感到震驚。

en: Tom was killed in a traffic accident.
zh: 湯姆在一次交通事故中喪生。

en: Tom was killed in a plane crash.
zh: 湯姆在一次飛機失事中喪生。

en: Tom was killed by a stray bullet.
zh: 湯姆被一顆流彈擊中身亡。

en: Tom was injured in a traffic accident.
zh: 湯姆在一次交通事故中受傷。

en: Tom was in a hurry so he left his bed unmade.
zh: 湯姆趕時間，所以他沒有整理床鋪。

en: Tom was hoping the committee would adopt his proposal.
zh: 汤姆希望委员会能采纳他的提案。

en: Tom was happy to be home after being away for so long.
zh: 汤姆离家这么久，很高兴能回到家。

en: Tom was angry at Mary because she parked in his space.
zh: 汤姆对玛丽很生气，因为她把车停在了他的车位上。

en: Tom was a little homesick.
zh: 汤姆有点想家。

en: Tom was a homicide detective before he retired.
zh: 汤姆退休前是一名凶杀案侦探。

en: Tom wants to know more about Mary's past.
zh: 汤姆想更多地了解玛丽的过去。

en: Tom wants to get a part-time job.
zh: 汤姆想找一份兼职工作。

en: Tom wanted to visit America.
zh: 汤姆想去美国看看。

en: Tom wanted to lose five pounds before summer vacation.
zh: 汤姆想在暑假前减掉五磅。

en: Tom wanted Mary to stay where she was until he got back.
zh: 汤姆想让玛丽待在原地等他回来。

en: Tom unbuttoned his shirt.
zh: 汤姆解开了衬衫的扣子。

en: Tom tried to speak, but couldn't.
zh: 汤姆想说话，但说不出来。

en: Tom tried to sell his old VCR instead of throwing it away, but no one would buy it, so he ended up throwing it away.
zh: 汤姆试图卖掉他的旧录像机，而不是把它扔掉，但没人买，所以他最终还是把它扔掉了。

en: Tom treated Mary like a slave.
zh: 汤姆像对待奴隶一样对待玛丽。

en: Tom took off his hat.
zh: 汤姆摘下了帽子。

en: Tom told me that I could keep the book if I wanted it.
zh: 汤姆告诉我如果我想要，我可以留下这本书。

en: Tom told me that he wasn't afraid of Mary.
zh: 汤姆告诉我他不怕玛丽。

en: Tom told me that he had a dream about Mary last night.
zh: 汤姆告诉我他昨晚梦见了玛丽。

en: Tom told Mary how much he loved her.
zh: 汤姆告诉玛丽他有多爱她。

en: Tom threw the apple core into the garbage can.
zh: 汤姆把苹果核扔进了垃圾桶。

en: Tom thinks of Mary as his best friend.
zh: 汤姆认为玛丽是他最好的朋友。

en: Tom thinks he knows how much money Mary makes, but Mary makes quite a bit more than Tom thinks she does.
zh: 汤姆以为他知道玛丽挣多少钱，但玛丽挣的钱比汤姆想象的要多得多。

en: Tom teaches us French.
zh: 汤姆教我们法语。

en: Tom started to feel like his life wasn't worth living.
zh: 汤姆开始觉得他的生命没有意义。

en: Tom solved the puzzle after Mary gave him a few hints.
zh: 玛丽给了汤姆一些提示后，汤姆解开了谜题。

en: Tom smiled at himself in the mirror.
zh: 汤姆对着镜子里的自己笑了笑。

en: Tom slung his bag over his shoulder.
zh: 汤姆把包甩到肩上。

en: Tom sides with Mary all the time.
zh: 汤姆总是站在玛丽一边。

en: Tom shut the door and locked it.
zh: 汤姆关上门并锁上了。

en: Tom shut his eyes.
zh: 汤姆闭上了眼睛。

en: Tom shared his mother's oatmeal cookie recipe with Mary.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽分享了他妈妈的燕麦饼干食谱。

en: Tom set up a website for Mary.
zh: 汤姆为玛丽建立了一个网站。

en: Tom set the alarm clock to go off 6:00 a.m.
zh: 汤姆把闹钟设置在早上六点响。

en: Tom seems a bit depressed this morning.
zh: 汤姆今天早上看起来有点沮丧。

en: Tom says he wants to learn how to fly an airplane.
zh: 汤姆说他想学习如何驾驶飞机。

en: Tom says he feels like he might throw up.
zh: 汤姆说他感觉自己可能要吐了。

en: Tom says he doesn't feel tired.
zh: 汤姆说他感觉不累。

en: Tom said that he thought Mary was still living with her parents.
zh: 汤姆说他认为玛丽仍然和她的父母住在一起。

en: Tom said he thought he had forgotten something.
zh: 汤姆说他觉得他好像忘记了什么。

en: Tom said he had nowhere to go.
zh: 汤姆说他无处可去。

en: Tom resisted the temptation to lean over and kiss Mary.
zh: 汤姆克制住了想俯身亲吻玛丽的冲动。

en: Tom remained single all his life.
zh: 汤姆一生都保持单身。

en: Tom regained his balance.
zh: 汤姆重新恢复了平衡。

en: Tom ran as fast as he could.
zh: 汤姆以最快的速度跑。

en: Tom promised to do everything he could to help me.
zh: 汤姆答应尽一切努力帮助我。

en: Tom probably won't want to tag along.
zh: 汤姆可能不想跟着去。

en: Tom pretended not to know how to get to Mary's school.
zh: 汤姆假装不知道怎么去玛丽的学校。

en: Tom planted some flowers in his yard.
zh: 汤姆在他的院子里种了一些花。

en: Tom passed out because of the heat.
zh: 汤姆因为中暑晕倒了。

en: Tom passed away last night.
zh: 汤姆昨晚去世了。

en: Tom parked in his usual spot.
zh: 汤姆把车停在他通常停的位置。

en: Tom never thought he'd be able to do what he just did.
zh: 汤姆从没想过他能做到他刚才做的事。

en: Tom made the same mistake again.
zh: 汤姆又犯了同样的错误。

en: Tom lost his umbrella.
zh: 汤姆把伞弄丢了。

en: Tom lost his eyesight.
zh: 汤姆失去了视力。

en: Tom looked as if he'd seen a ghost.
zh: 汤姆看起来好像见了鬼一样。

en: Tom lives in Boston.
zh: 汤姆住在波士顿。

en: Tom lives alone in a small cabin near a waterfall.
zh: 汤姆独自住在瀑布附近的一个小木屋里。

en: Tom linked to my website from his blog.
zh: 汤姆在他的博客上链接了我的网站。

en: Tom likes to stay home and read books on weekends.
zh: 汤姆喜欢周末待在家里看书。

en: Tom likes to push the limits.
zh: 汤姆喜欢挑战极限。

en: Tom likes his spaghetti noodles a little on the hard side.
zh: 汤姆喜欢稍微硬一点的意大利面。

en: Tom let the cat out of the bag.
zh: 汤姆泄露了秘密。

en: Tom knows a man whose daughter lives in Boston.
zh: 汤姆认识一个人，他的女儿住在波士顿。

en: Tom kept his mouth shut.
zh: 汤姆闭口不言。

en: Tom keeps telling everyone how busy he is.
zh: 汤姆一直告诉大家他有多忙。

en: Tom just took a chance and called Mary to ask her out.
zh: 汤姆只是试了一下，打电话给玛丽约她出去。

en: Tom isn't old enough to go to school.
zh: 汤姆还没到上学的年龄。

en: Tom is very conservative.
zh: 汤姆非常保守。

en: Tom is teaching us French.
zh: 汤姆正在教我们法语。

en: Tom is probably with Mary right now.
zh: 汤姆现在可能和玛丽在一起。

en: Tom is probably just a year or two younger than Mary.
zh: 汤姆可能只比玛丽小一两岁。

en: Tom is particular about what he eats.
zh: 汤姆对吃的东西很讲究。

en: Tom is out.
zh: 汤姆出去了。

en: Tom is opposed to the plan.
zh: 汤姆反对这个计划。

en: Tom is looking for an easy way to lose weight.
zh: 汤姆正在寻找一种简单的减肥方法。

en: Tom is in the kitchen making tea.
zh: 汤姆正在厨房里泡茶。

en: Tom is happier now that Mary has left.
zh: 玛丽离开后，汤姆现在更快乐了。

en: Tom is a picky eater.
zh: 汤姆很挑食。

en: Tom is a bit conceited.
zh: 汤姆有点自负。

en: Tom intends to go, rain or shine.
zh: 汤姆打算去，无论晴天还是下雨。

en: Tom hasn't played mahjong in ages.
zh: 汤姆很久没打麻将了。

en: Tom hasn't been very well recently.
zh: 汤姆最近身体不太好。

en: Tom has the habit of biting his nails.
zh: 汤姆有咬指甲的习惯。

en: Tom has never kissed Mary.
zh: 汤姆从未亲吻过玛丽。

en: Tom has never been absent from school.
zh: 汤姆从未缺席过学校。

en: Tom has had a bad week.
zh: 汤姆这周过得很糟糕。

en: Tom has been teaching us French for the past four years.
zh: 汤姆过去四年一直在教我们法语。

en: Tom has been sick in bed for a long time.
zh: 汤姆已经卧病在床很久了。

en: Tom has been living abroad for a very long time.
zh: 汤姆在国外生活了很长时间。

en: Tom has been hunting for a job since he lost his previous job last year.
zh: 自从去年失去工作后，汤姆一直在找工作。

en: Tom has already finished his lunch.
zh: 汤姆已经吃完午饭了。

en: Tom has already delivered the package to Mary's house.
zh: 汤姆已经把包裹送到玛丽家了。

en: Tom has a party two or three times a year.
zh: 汤姆一年举办两三次派对。

en: Tom has a good head for numbers.
zh: 汤姆对数字很敏感。

en: Tom had plenty of chances to apologize, but he didn't.
zh: 汤姆有很多机会道歉，但他没有。

en: Tom had nothing to do with getting Mary fired.
zh: 汤姆与玛丽被解雇没有任何关系。

en: Tom had no way of knowing that this would happen.
zh: 汤姆无法知道会发生这种事。

en: Tom had no intention of giving up.
zh: 汤姆没有放弃的打算。

en: Tom had a hard time finding work.
zh: 汤姆很难找到工作。

en: Tom had a good time in Boston.
zh: 汤姆在波士顿玩得很开心。

en: Tom got shot in the back.
zh: 汤姆背部中枪了。

en: Tom got off the elevator.
zh: 汤姆下了电梯。

en: Tom got off the bus.
zh: 汤姆下了公共汽车。

en: Tom got good at tennis.
zh: 汤姆擅长打网球了。

en: Tom got angry.
zh: 汤姆生气了。

en: Tom goes to Boston every once in a while.
zh: 汤姆偶尔会去波士顿。

en: Tom gets drunk almost every evening.
zh: 汤姆几乎每天晚上都喝醉。

en: Tom gave a speech.
zh: 汤姆发表了演讲。

en: Tom found a hundred dollar bill on the street.
zh: 汤姆在街上捡到了一张一百美元的钞票。

en: Tom forgot where he left his umbrella.
zh: 汤姆忘记了他把伞放在哪里了。

en: Tom finished reading that book in one night.
zh: 汤姆一个晚上就读完了那本书。

en: Tom felt very lonely.
zh: 汤姆感到非常孤独。

en: Tom felt relieved.
zh: 汤姆感到如释重负。

en: Tom felt Mary wasn't being sincere.
zh: 汤姆觉得玛丽不够真诚。

en: Tom fell down.
zh: 汤姆摔倒了。

en: Tom fell down the stairs.
zh: 汤姆从楼梯上摔下来了。

en: Tom fell asleep watching TV.
zh: 汤姆看电视时睡着了。

en: Tom explained everything to Mary.
zh: 汤姆向玛丽解释了一切。

en: Tom expects too much of Mary.
zh: 汤姆对玛丽期望太高了。

en: Tom eventually found a job that he liked.
zh: 汤姆最终找到了一份他喜欢的工作。

en: Tom drank too much.
zh: 汤姆喝太多了。

en: Tom doesn't want to talk about his private life.
zh: 汤姆不想谈论他的私生活。

en: Tom doesn't want to lie to Mary.
zh: 汤姆不想对玛丽撒谎。

en: Tom doesn't want Mary to go.
zh: 汤姆不想让玛丽去。

en: Tom doesn't trust anyone.
zh: 汤姆不信任任何人。

en: Tom doesn't think he has the time to help you today.
zh: 汤姆觉得他今天没时间帮你。

en: Tom doesn't seem to have any self-confidence.
zh: 汤姆似乎没有任何自信。

en: Tom doesn't really talk about his problems much.
zh: 汤姆不太谈论他的问题。

en: Tom doesn't like to talk about his work.
zh: 汤姆不喜欢谈论他的工作。

en: Tom doesn't like this color.
zh: 汤姆不喜欢这个颜色。

en: Tom doesn't know what to do first.
zh: 汤姆不知道先做什么。

en: Tom doesn't know squat about Mary.
zh: 汤姆对玛丽一无所知。

en: Tom doesn't know how to dance.
zh: 汤姆不会跳舞。

en: Tom doesn't have anything to eat.
zh: 汤姆没有任何东西可以吃。

en: Tom doesn't drink alcoholic drinks at all.
zh: 汤姆根本不喝含酒精的饮料。

en: Tom does everything he can to save money.
zh: 汤姆竭尽所能地省钱。

en: Tom disappeared.
zh: 汤姆失踪了。

en: Tom died of cancer.
zh: 汤姆死于癌症。

en: Tom didn't want to work overtime on Christmas Eve.
zh: 汤姆不想在圣诞节前夕加班。

en: Tom didn't want to bother Mary while she was studying.
zh: 汤姆不想打扰正在学习的玛丽。

en: Tom didn't want Mary to come here.
zh: 汤姆不想让玛丽来这里。

en: Tom didn't trust Mary and she didn't trust him.
zh: 汤姆不信任玛丽，玛丽也不信任他。

en: Tom didn't say that.
zh: 汤姆没说过那样的话。

en: Tom didn't say a word.
zh: 汤姆一言不发。

en: Tom didn't mean to hurt anybody.
zh: 汤姆不是故意要伤害任何人。

en: Tom didn't marry Mary.
zh: 汤姆没有和玛丽结婚。

en: Tom didn't know that Mary liked to cook.
zh: 汤姆不知道玛丽喜欢做饭。

en: Tom didn't know that he had a secret admirer.
zh: 汤姆不知道他有一个秘密崇拜者。

en: Tom didn't know how to reply.
zh: 汤姆不知道该怎么回复。

en: Tom didn't hear Mary enter the room.
zh: 汤姆没听到玛丽走进房间。

en: Tom didn't have any hard evidence, but he thought Mary was the one who stole his mother's diamond ring.
zh: 汤姆没有任何确凿的证据，但他认为玛丽是偷走他母亲钻石戒指的人。

en: Tom didn't expect to win the race.
zh: 汤姆没料到会赢得比赛。

en: Tom didn't expect to fall in love with Mary.
zh: 汤姆没料到会爱上玛丽。

en: Tom didn't do anything wrong.
zh: 汤姆没做错任何事。

en: Tom didn't ask for our opinions.
zh: 汤姆没有征求我们的意见。

en: Tom didn't answer the question.
zh: 汤姆没有回答问题。

en: Tom described his new invention to both John and Mary.
zh: 汤姆向约翰和玛丽描述了他的新发明。

en: Tom denied the rumor.
zh: 汤姆否认了这个谣言。

en: Tom demonstrated how to core an apple.
zh: 汤姆演示了如何去除苹果核。

en: Tom decided to try sleeping without a pillow.
zh: 汤姆决定尝试不枕枕头睡觉。

en: Tom decided to give up city life and live in the country.
zh: 汤姆决定放弃城市生活，到乡下居住。

en: Tom decided that it wasn't necessary to take vitamins.
zh: 汤姆认为没有必要服用维生素。

en: Tom decided not to tell Mary about what John had done.
zh: 汤姆决定不告诉玛丽约翰做过的事情。

en: Tom cut himself on some broken glass.
zh: 汤姆被一些碎玻璃划伤了。

en: Tom currently doesn't make as much money as he used to.
zh: 汤姆目前的收入不如以前多了。

en: Tom couldn't stop yawning.
zh: 汤姆忍不住打哈欠。

en: Tom couldn't sneak out of the dorm without being seen.
zh: 汤姆无法在不被发现的情况下偷偷溜出宿舍。

en: Tom couldn't remember where he had been on that night.
zh: 汤姆不记得那天晚上他在哪里。

en: Tom couldn't put his thoughts in order.
zh: 汤姆无法理清思绪。

en: Tom couldn't just sit by and watch Mary being bullied.
zh: 汤姆不能袖手旁观，眼睁睁地看着玛丽被欺负。

en: Tom couldn't get to sleep till after three last night.
zh: 汤姆昨晚直到三点多才睡着。

en: Tom couldn't feel a thing.
zh: 汤姆什么也感觉不到。

en: Tom couldn't do what he wanted to.
zh: 汤姆无法做他想做的事情。

en: Tom couldn't decide what book to read.
zh: 汤姆无法决定读哪本书。

en: Tom could see Mary was about ready to cry.
zh: 汤姆看得出玛丽快要哭了。

en: Tom could have dealt with the problem in a better way.
zh: 汤姆本可以用更好的方式处理这个问题。

en: Tom continued to study French for another three years.
zh: 汤姆又继续学习了三年法语。

en: Tom clearly wasn't listening to what Mary was saying.
zh: 汤姆显然没有在听玛丽说什么。

en: Tom cleared his throat.
zh: 汤姆清了清嗓子。

en: Tom claimed that he could run faster than Mary.
zh: 汤姆声称他能比玛丽跑得更快。

en: Tom chose the restaurant where we ate lunch.
zh: 汤姆选择了我们吃午饭的餐厅。

en: Tom checked to make sure the gas was turned off.
zh: 汤姆检查以确保煤气已经关掉了。

en: Tom certainly wasn't fazed by what Mary said.
zh: 玛丽说的话显然没有让汤姆感到不安。

en: Tom certainly sounds like he comes from a rich family.
zh: 汤姆听起来确实像来自富裕家庭。

en: Tom certainly knew that what he was doing was illegal.
zh: 汤姆当然知道他所做的事情是非法的。

en: Tom certainly is smart.
zh: 汤姆确实很聪明。

en: Tom certainly has a nice voice.
zh: 汤姆确实有个好嗓子。

en: Tom can't tell the difference between expensive wine and cheap wine.
zh: 汤姆分不清昂贵的葡萄酒和廉价葡萄酒的区别。

en: Tom can't taste the difference between expensive wine and cheap wine.
zh: 汤姆尝不出昂贵的葡萄酒和廉价葡萄酒的区别。

en: Tom can't swim very well yet.
zh: 汤姆还不太会游泳。

en: Tom can't remember exactly what he was supposed to do.
zh: 汤姆记不清他到底应该做什么了。

en: Tom can't decide which approach to take.
zh: 汤姆无法决定采取哪种方法。

en: Tom can hardly fit into the jeans he bought last year.
zh: 汤姆几乎穿不上去年买的牛仔裤了。

en: Tom can do whatever he wants as far as I'm concerned.
zh: 就我而言，汤姆想做什么就做什么。

en: Tom can be contacted by email.
zh: 可以通过电子邮件联系到汤姆。

en: Tom came to Japan from Australia.
zh: 汤姆从澳大利亚来到日本。

en: Tom brought refreshments.
zh: 汤姆带来了茶点。

en: Tom brought Mary a gift.
zh: 汤姆给玛丽带了一份礼物。

en: Tom broke up with Mary.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽分手了。

en: Tom bought his truck used.
zh: 汤姆买了他的二手卡车。

en: Tom began to cry.
zh: 汤姆开始哭了。

en: Tom became nervous.
zh: 汤姆变得紧张起来。

en: Tom became John's roommate.
zh: 汤姆成了约翰的室友。

en: Tom became famous because he married a famous actress who had been married many times before.
zh: 汤姆因为娶了一个结过很多次婚的著名女演员而出名。

en: Tom became famous as a violinist.
zh: 汤姆作为一名小提琴家而出名。

en: Tom asked several people the same question.
zh: 汤姆问了好几个人同样的问题。

en: Tom asked Mary how much money she had.
zh: 汤姆问玛丽她有多少钱。

en: Tom asked Mary for some money.
zh: 汤姆向玛丽要了一些钱。

en: Tom asked Mary about her family.
zh: 汤姆问玛丽关于她的家人。

en: Tom asked for more coffee.
zh: 汤姆要了更多的咖啡。

en: Tom asked for a raise.
zh: 汤姆要求加薪。

en: Tom arrived home soaking wet.
zh: 汤姆浑身湿透地回到家。

en: Tom applied for a visa.
zh: 汤姆申请了签证。

en: Tom answered the phone.
zh: 汤姆接了电话。

en: Tom answered all the questions that Mary asked him.
zh: 汤姆回答了玛丽问他的所有问题。

en: Tom and Mary speak to each other in English.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽用英语交谈。

en: Tom and Mary often talk to each other using Skype.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽经常用Skype互相交谈。

en: Tom and Mary insult each other all the time.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽总是互相侮辱。

en: Tom and Mary hope that their next child will be a boy.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽希望他们的下一个孩子是个男孩。

en: Tom and Mary have no children.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽没有孩子。

en: Tom and Mary have a lot in common.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽有很多共同点。

en: Tom and Mary had an enjoyable day together at the zoo.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在动物园度过了愉快的一天。

en: Tom and Mary don't have much time to talk together. Their children are always demanding their attention.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽没有太多时间交谈。他们的孩子总是需要他们的关注。

en: Tom and Mary both enjoyed that movie.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都很喜欢那部电影。

en: Tom always carries a camera with him wherever he goes.
zh: 汤姆无论去哪里都总是带着相机。

en: Tom almost forgot about the meeting.
zh: 汤姆差点忘了那个会议。

en: Tom admitted his mistake.
zh: 汤姆承认了他的错误。

en: There's not enough room in here for both Tom and Mary.
zh: 这里没有足够的空间容纳汤姆和玛丽。

en: The police couldn't find any footprints outside Tom's bedroom window.
zh: 警察在汤姆卧室窗外没有发现任何脚印。

en: The most dangerous thing Tom ever tried to do was bungee jumping.
zh: 汤姆做过的最危险的事情是蹦极。

en: Someone stabbed Tom with an ice pick, but he's OK now.
zh: 有人用冰锥刺伤了汤姆，但他现在没事了。

en: Mary is Tom's stepmother.
zh: 玛丽是汤姆的继母。

en: Mary asked Tom what he thought of her dress, but he knew better than to tell her what he really thought.
zh: 玛丽问汤姆觉得她的裙子怎么样，但他很清楚最好不要告诉她他的真实想法。

en: It's been three years since Tom started working for Mary.
zh: 汤姆为玛丽工作已经三年了。

en: It was Tom's first time to see the Golden Gate Bridge.
zh: 那是汤姆第一次看到金门大桥。

en: It was hard to resist the impulse to wring Tom's neck.
zh: 很难抑制住想掐死汤姆脖子的冲动。

en: It took Tom every ounce of courage he had to admit to Mary that he had once been part of a terrorist group.
zh: 汤姆鼓起了他所有的勇气才敢向玛丽承认他曾经是一个恐怖组织的一员。

en: I think Tom likes Mary.
zh: 我认为汤姆喜欢玛丽。

en: I think Tom could accomplish just about anything he decides to do.
zh: 我认为汤姆几乎可以完成他决定做的任何事情。

en: I could kick myself for not inviting Tom and Mary to my party.
zh: 我真想踢自己一脚，因为我没有邀请汤姆和玛丽参加我的聚会。

en: How long have you known Tom?
zh: 你认识汤姆多久了？

en: Do you think I should tell Tom?
zh: 你认为我应该告诉汤姆吗？

en: Convincing Tom to do the right thing was hard.
zh: 说服汤姆做正确的事情很难。

en: After Tom dumped Mary, she started seeing John.
zh: 汤姆甩了玛丽之后，她开始和约翰约会。

en: A young boy, who couldn't have been more than five years old, asked Tom how to get to the post office.
zh: 一个年轻的男孩，看起来不超过五岁，问汤姆怎么去邮局。

en: You should eat more.
zh: 你应该多吃点。

en: You need to relax.
zh: 你需要放松一下。

en: Where did you get this list?
zh: 你从哪里得到这份清单的？

en: Washing the car took longer than we expected.
zh: 洗车比我们预期的要花更长的时间。

en: There's something I need to tell you before you leave.
zh: 在你离开之前，有些事情我需要告诉你。

en: There are some things that you should never try doing.
zh: 有些事情是你绝对不应该尝试去做的。

en: No matter what I try, I can't seem to give up smoking.
zh: 无论我怎么努力，我似乎都无法戒烟。

en: It's difficult to help people when they don't want your help.
zh: 当人们不想要你的帮助时，很难帮助他们。

en: I'm willing to take care of your children, if you want me to.
zh: 如果你愿意，我愿意照顾你的孩子。

en: I'm just not cut out for this kind of work.
zh: 我就是不适合做这种工作。

en: I'll be back.
zh: 我会回来的。

en: I wish I had a reason not to go.
zh: 我希望我有一个不去的理由。

en: I don't want to talk about it.
zh: 我不想谈论这件事。

en: I don't know what this means.
zh: 我不知道这是什么意思。

en: I could kick myself for not bringing a map.
zh: 我真该打自己，竟然没带地图。

en: Do you have any plans for tonight?
zh: 你今晚有什么计划吗？

en: Cleaning the garage wasn't much fun.
zh: 打扫车库没什么乐趣。

en: Man is the only animal subject to becoming an imbecile.
zh: 人是唯一会变成白痴的动物。

en: I'll do my best to have no regrets.
zh: 我会尽力不让自己后悔。

en: My mother is making dinner.
zh: 我妈妈正在做晚饭。

en: Since he was able to walk so far, he must have strong legs.
zh: 既然他能走这么远，他一定有强壮的腿。

en: Back when there were still hundred yen bills, the American dollar was worth 360 yen.
zh: 在还有一百日元纸币的时候，美元值360日元。

en: I took today off in exchange for working on Sunday.
zh: 我今天休息，以换取星期天工作。

en: If you don't put on hand cream, your hands will get dry.
zh: 如果你不涂护手霜，你的手会变干。

en: I was worried that I was going to be late when I missed my train, but I managed to get there just in time!
zh: 我错过了火车，很担心会迟到，但我还是设法及时赶到了！

en: What are you eating?
zh: 你在吃什么？

en: This pleases me.
zh: 这让我很高兴。

en: That's a lemon tree.
zh: 那是一棵柠檬树。

en: That's a blue house.
zh: 那是一栋蓝色的房子。

en: The man is a woman.
zh: 那个人是女人。

en: Frank eats some cheese.
zh: 弗兰克吃了一些奶酪。

en: I'm Korean.
zh: 我是韩国人。

en: I like China.
zh: 我喜欢中国。

en: He really likes the United States.
zh: 他非常喜欢美国。

en: Do you like tea?
zh: 你喜欢茶吗？

en: I don't like this book.
zh: 我不喜欢这本书。

en: Do you like your boss?
zh: 你喜欢你的老板吗？

en: Do you like Chinese food?
zh: 你喜欢中国菜吗？

en: I really like my coworkers.
zh: 我非常喜欢我的同事。

en: Do you like my friend?
zh: 你喜欢我的朋友吗？

en: Do you like school?
zh: 你喜欢学校吗？

en: That's a tree.
zh: 那是一棵树。

en: We are here.
zh: 我们在这里。

en: I ate.
zh: 我吃了。

en: I will eat.
zh: 我会吃。

en: This is me eating a banana.
zh: 这是我在吃香蕉。

en: He is Ramudu.
zh: 他是拉穆杜。

en: Read this.
zh: 读这个。

en: Bring tea.
zh: 拿茶来。

en: Its long neck resembles that of a horse.
zh: 它长长的脖子像马一样。

en: I need some nutmeg.
zh: 我需要一些肉豆蔻。

en: Congratulations on your face.
zh: 恭喜你的脸。

en: How do you want your steak?
zh: 你的牛排要几分熟？

en: It's OK with me if we barbecue, but I don't like it when smoke gets in my eyes.
zh: 如果我们要烧烤，我没问题，但是我不喜欢烟熏到我的眼睛。

en: You should stay away from Takashi for now. He has a work interview tomorrow or something, and he's really tense.
zh: 你现在最好离高志远一点。他明天好像有个工作面试，而且他真的很紧张。

en: You know, the ones where you skewer some marshmallows and roast them. I don't know what they're called but they're really good. Let's try roasting some at my place sometime, too.
zh: 你知道，就是那种把棉花糖串起来烤着吃的。我不知道它们叫什么，但它们真的很好吃。我们下次也来我家烤一些吧。

en: His advice didn't help at all.
zh: 他的建议一点用都没有。

en: That school looks just like a prison.
zh: 那所学校看起来就像一座监狱。

en: Why is the car in front driving so slowly? I'm going to be late for work.
zh: 前面的车为什么开这么慢？我上班要迟到了。

en: We see what we want to see.
zh: 我们只会看到我们想看到的。

en: She's good at tennis.
zh: 她擅长打网球。

en: My leg's gone to sleep, so I don't think I can stand up right away.
zh: 我的腿麻了，所以我想我不能马上站起来。

en: My leg's gone to sleep, so whatever you do, don't touch my leg now.
zh: 我的腿麻了，所以无论你做什么，现在都不要碰我的腿。

en: Please don't make me laugh. I did too many sit-ups yesterday and my stomach muscles hurt.
zh: 请不要让我笑。我昨天做了太多的仰卧起坐，我的腹肌很痛。

en: I'm begging you. Don't make me laugh. I did too many sit-ups yesterday and my stomach muscles hurt.
zh: 我求你了。不要让我笑。我昨天做了太多的仰卧起坐，我的腹肌很痛。

en: I saw many people who had no clothes and I saw many clothes which had no people in them.
zh: 我看到很多人没有衣服，我也看到很多衣服里面没有人。

en: Tom pretended he didn't understand what Mary wanted him to do.
zh: 汤姆假装他不知道玛丽想让他做什么。

en: Don't play dumb. Answer my question properly!
zh: 别装傻。好好回答我的问题！

en: The truth is that I lied.
zh: 事实是我撒谎了。

en: Tom does not like this color.
zh: 汤姆不喜欢这个颜色。

en: I play tennis after school.
zh: 我放学后打网球。

en: That's none of your business!
zh: 这不关你的事！

en: He learned that poem by heart when he was five years old.
zh: 他五岁的时候就把那首诗背下来了。

en: He memorized that poem when he was five years old.
zh: 他五岁的时候就记住了那首诗。

en: It doesn't matter how much you keep saying this is your house, please stop walking around naked.
zh: 不管你怎么说这是你的房子，请不要再裸体走来走去了。

en: Even if it's your own house, please stop walking around naked.
zh: 即使这是你自己的房子，请不要再裸体走来走去了。

en: No matter how much you keep saying this is your house, please stop walking around naked.
zh: 无论你怎么说这是你的房子，请不要再裸体走来走去了。

en: What's wrong with being nude in your own house?
zh: 在自己家里裸体有什么问题吗？

en: I don't know the Latin language.
zh: 我不懂拉丁语。

en: The fish can swim.
zh: 鱼会游泳。

en: It occured to me that my sentences may never be translated.
zh: 我突然想到我的句子可能永远不会被翻译。

en: Their hats are hanging over there.
zh: 他们的帽子挂在那边。

en: The sunny side of the hill is full of deciduous trees.
zh: 山坡向阳的一面长满了落叶树。

en: Jump!
zh: 跳！

en: Come over here.
zh: 过来这边。

en: I have brought my shoes, coat and umbrella.
zh: 我带了我的鞋子、外套和雨伞。

en: Where is the bus?
zh: 公共汽车在哪里？

en: Where does that idiot think he is going?
zh: 那个白痴以为他要去哪里？

en: Your cell phone rang a minute ago.
zh: 你的手机一分钟前响了。

en: Tom sketched a picture of an elephant for Mary.
zh: 汤姆为玛丽画了一张大象的素描。

en: Tom read somewhere that short people need more sleep than tall people.
zh: 汤姆在某个地方读到过，矮个子比高个子需要更多的睡眠。

en: Tom put a Band-Aid over his small tattoo of a spider so he would be allowed into a Japanese hot spring.
zh: 汤姆在他的小蜘蛛纹身上贴了一个创可贴，这样他就可以进入日本的温泉了。

en: She says she likes flowers.
zh: 她说她喜欢花。

en: You wanna arm wrestle?
zh: 你想掰手腕吗？

en: What's wrong with running around your house naked?
zh: 光着身子在你房子里跑有什么不对吗？

en: What's wrong with parading around your own house naked?
zh: 在你自己的房子里裸体游行有什么不对吗？

en: Years ago, when Tom's children were young, he used to take a lot of pictures.
zh: 多年前，当汤姆的孩子还小的时候，他经常拍照。

en: Did you hear about Tom's resignation?
zh: 你听说汤姆辞职的事了吗？

en: Does Tom always carry a gun?
zh: 汤姆总是带着枪吗？

en: It never occurred to me that Tom might not be telling the truth.
zh: 我从来没有想到汤姆可能没有说实话。

en: Mr Briggs is not any doctor, he is an excellent surgeon.
zh: 布里格斯先生不是普通的医生，他是一位出色的外科医生。

en: I don't want any sugar.
zh: 我不要糖。

en: Monica doesn't study a lot.
zh: 莫妮卡不怎么学习。

en: Tom ate at a new restaurant the other day, but he doesn't remember the restaurant's name.
zh: 汤姆前几天在一家新餐厅吃了饭，但他不记得餐厅的名字了。

en: She has a very open personality.
zh: 她性格非常开朗。

en: The house next door is a bit loud. I wonder if they're throwing a party.
zh: 隔壁的房子有点吵。 我想知道他们是不是在开派对。

en: Hearing that a transfer student was coming, the class buzzed with excitement.
zh: 听说要来一个转学生，班里顿时热闹起来。

en: The rain that was drizzling when I got on to the train is now pouring.
zh: 我上火车时还是毛毛细雨，现在却下起了倾盆大雨。

en: The kids that had been so lively when they were awake are now silently sleeping soundly.
zh: 孩子们醒着的时候还很活泼，现在却都安静地熟睡了。

en: When I see the soundly sleeping face of my daughter, I think, "I will give it my all tomorrow, too."
zh: 当我看到女儿熟睡的脸庞时，我想，“明天我也要全力以赴。”

en: If it didn't need to be done, nobody would do this kind of thing.
zh: 如果不是非做不可，谁也不会做这种事。

en: An ash-colored rabbit appeared and as soon as I drew near, it hopped and ran into the woods again.
zh: 出现了一只灰色的兔子，我一靠近，它就跳着跑进了树林。

en: Why is she here?
zh: 她为什么会在这里？

en: The bread I got from my neighbor, Mr. Yamada, had a soft texture, and my father, who prefers hard bread, was sure to dislike it.
zh: 我从邻居山田先生那里得到的面包质地柔软，喜欢硬面包的父亲肯定不喜欢。

en: Since my husband became sick he's lost 20 kilograms and his pants are now baggy.
zh: 自从我丈夫生病以来，他瘦了20公斤，裤子现在都很宽松了。

en: Since my husband became sick he's lost as much as 20 kilograms and his pants are now baggy.
zh: 自从我丈夫生病以来，他瘦了多达20公斤，裤子现在都很宽松了。

en: He was confused by something, as though he wasn't used to this kind of restaurant, but I stayed clear of him by pretending that I, too, wasn't used to the restaurant.
zh: 他好像不习惯这种餐厅，显得有些困惑，但我装作我也不习惯这家餐厅，和他保持距离。

en: My little sister's hobby is designing icons on the web, and she distributes them free of charge on her website whenever she finds the free time to do so.
zh: 我妹妹的爱好是在网上设计图标，她只要有空，就会在她的网站上免费发布。

en: There are nine million bicycles in Beijing.
zh: 北京有九百万辆自行车。

en: The soup is too hot.
zh: 汤太烫了。

en: Black cats are bad luck.
zh: 黑猫是不吉利的。

en: The cat is black.
zh: 这只猫是黑色的。

en: Please speak slowly and clearly.
zh: 请说慢一点，清楚一点。

en: I don't have a friend with whom I can talk about this.
zh: 我没有可以倾诉这件事的朋友。

en: I didn't know that you were seeing someone.
zh: 我不知道你在和别人交往。

en: There are two staircases in my house.
zh: 我家有两座楼梯。

en: The first things that you hear when you arrive at Las Vegas are the dings of the slot machines.
zh: 你到达拉斯维加斯时首先听到的就是老虎机的叮当声。

en: Critique of Pure Reason is German philosopher Immanuel Kant's chief literary work.

zh: 我们必须告诉他这件事。

en: We should inform them about that.
zh: 我们应该把这件事通知他们。

en: That is good to me.
zh: 那对我很好。

en: I like fruit.
zh: 我喜欢水果。

en: I know how to do it.
zh: 我知道怎么做。

en: Show me the person who loves you.
zh: 给我看看那个爱你的人。

en: Alice sleeps in her room.
zh: 爱丽丝在她的房间里睡觉。

en: Give the house to my daughter.
zh: 把房子给我女儿。

en: The house is burning!
zh: 房子着火了！

en: Don't you think it's time for you to settle down?
zh: 你不觉得你该安定下来了吗？

en: I want to talk in Lojban.
zh: 我想用逻辑语说话。

en: Are you allergic to this medicine?
zh: 你对这种药过敏吗？

en: I'm going to buy some currant juice.
zh: 我要去买些醋栗汁。

en: Her sadness was written all over her face.
zh: 她的悲伤都写在脸上了。

en: Due to the thick fog, the road was difficult to see.
zh: 由于雾很大，道路很难看清。

en: Even when one is being praised, modesty is important.
zh: 即使在受到赞扬时，谦虚也很重要。

en: He was a jester, and nothing more. He felt no pain; he was a jester, and nothing more.
zh: 他只是个小丑，仅此而已。他感觉不到痛苦；他只是个小丑，仅此而已。

en: I'm not sure why Tom didn't want to meet Mary.
zh: 我不确定为什么汤姆不想见玛丽。

en: I'm not sure why Tom said those things, but I bet he now wishes he hadn't.
zh: 我不确定汤姆为什么要说那些话，但我敢打赌他现在后悔说了。

en: There are a lot of fish in this lake.
zh: 这个湖里有很多鱼。

en: Amsterdam is amazing!
zh: 阿姆斯特丹太棒了！

en: I asked my mother to wake me up at four.
zh: 我让妈妈四点叫醒我。

en: The translation of this sentence is a bad translation.
zh: 这句话的翻译很糟糕。

en: Do you like trips?
zh: 你喜欢旅行吗？

en: It's a harp.
zh: 这是一把竖琴。

en: This is a harp.
zh: 这是一把竖琴。

en: Let's return to Japan together.
zh: 我们一起回日本吧。

en: I feel like I understand your feelings.
zh: 我感觉我理解你的感受。

en: It's Baba's voice.
zh: 这是巴巴的声音。

en: It's the voice of an old woman.
zh: 这是个老妇人的声音。

en: Should we sing?
zh: 我们唱歌吗？

en: Dorothy and her friends continued their journey heading for Emerald city.
zh: 多萝西和她的朋友们继续他们的旅程，前往翡翠城。

en: My sister likes Ultraman.
zh: 我妹妹喜欢奥特曼。

en: My favorite bar is located below the railway, so I always hear the clanging noise of the trains passing by when I'm drinking.
zh: 我最喜欢的酒吧位于铁路下方，所以我喝酒的时候总是听到火车经过的哐当声。

en: After the earthquake, the land value in this area went down a lot.
zh: 地震后，这个地区的土地价值下降了很多。

en: Ken will work as an area manager for this convenience store starting this Spring.
zh: 肯将从今年春天开始担任这家便利店的区域经理。

en: The parrot is dead.
zh: 鹦鹉死了。

en: She's wearing plain clothes. However, she cannot hide the elegance that comes from her upbringing.
zh: 她穿着朴素的衣服。 然而，她无法掩盖她从小接受的教育所带来的优雅。

en: Believe in yourself.
zh: 相信你自己。

en: I'm having trouble reading the letters on the monitor.
zh: 我很难看清显示器上的字母。

en: I don't like it when it's very hot.
zh: 我不喜欢太热的天气。

en: I'd like to tell her that I love her.
zh: 我想告诉她我爱她。

en: I'm sorry for your grandfather.
zh: 我对你祖父的去世感到难过。

en: I want to say goodbye.
zh: 我想道别。

en: That is mine. I don't know where yours is.
zh: 那是我的。我不知道你的在哪里。

en: Spanish and Portuguese are very similar languages.
zh: 西班牙语和葡萄牙语是非常相似的语言。

en: Do you eat veal?
zh: 你吃小牛肉吗？

en: Mining is one of the main sources of wealth in Chile.
zh: 采矿是智利的主要财富来源之一。

en: Tom wanted to become a sign language interpreter.
zh: 汤姆想成为一名手语翻译。

en: My stomach hurts after meals.
zh: 我饭后胃疼。

en: There is a coffee shop over there.
zh: 那边有一家咖啡店。

en: The constitutional court will issue a decision by noon today.
zh: 宪法法院将于今天中午前做出裁决。

en: On September 26, 1959, the strongest typhoon in Japan's recorded history hit Nagoya.
zh: 1959年9月26日，日本有记录以来最强烈的台风袭击了名古屋。

en: She is an absent-minded and unreliable person.
zh: 她是一个心不在焉且不可靠的人。

en: I like this job, but I'd prefer not to call my boss over in a loud voice whenever something bad happens. I'm partial to elegance.
zh: 我喜欢这份工作，但我不想在发生不好的事情时大声喊我的老板过来。我喜欢优雅。

en: My son? He doesn't seem to be interested in classical music. I always hear some loud music coming from his room, though - techno, electric, or what have you.
zh: 我儿子？他似乎对古典音乐不感兴趣。我总是听到他房间里传来一些很大的音乐声—— техно, 电音，或者其他什么。

en: My son? He doesn't seem interested in classical music. I can't tell whether it's techno or electro, but he's always listening to music at a loud volume.
zh: 我儿子？他似乎对古典音乐不感兴趣。我分不清是 техно 还是电音，但他总是很大声地听音乐。

en: My boyfriend discovered the erotic comics book that I had been hiding.
zh: 我男朋友发现了我一直藏着的色情漫画书。

en: My boyfriend discovered the erotic manga that I had been hiding.
zh: 我男朋友发现了我一直藏着的色情漫画。

en: This author's books don't suit me because the erotic descriptions are too perverted.
zh: 这位作者的书不适合我，因为其中的色情描写太变态了。

en: Not knowing what to do, I called her.
zh: 不知道该怎么办，我给她打了电话。

en: I like to feed the pigeons.
zh: 我喜欢喂鸽子。

en: I'm just a little bored.
zh: 我只是有点无聊。

en: She doesn't eat meat, does she?
zh: 她不吃肉，是吗？

en: As you'd expect from a high-end model, the user settings are amazingly detailed. It seems like it'll be a while until I can get one of my own.
zh: 正如您对高端型号所期望的那样，用户设置非常详细。看来我还需要一段时间才能拥有一个自己的。

en: The song I heard before in the train station loops endlessly around my head.
zh: 我之前在火车站听到的那首歌在我脑海里无限循环。

en: I finally saw the ocean after getting out on the balcony. Should I say that this room has an ocean view?
zh: 我终于在走到阳台上后看到了大海。我应该说这个房间有海景吗？

en: The creatures he thought of looked like flying vomit to everyone else.
zh: 在他看来是奇妙生物的东西，在其他人看来就像是飞起来的呕吐物。

en: You can not solve your doubts until you face the culprit.
zh: 你只有面对罪魁祸首，才能解开你的疑惑。

en: She arrogantly answered in my place.
zh: 她傲慢地替我回答了。

en: One day, her dream to be dressed in haute couture came true in an unexpected way.
zh: 有一天，她穿上高级定制服装的梦想以一种意想不到的方式实现了。

en: Er, I can only drive cars with an automatic transmission.
zh: 额，我只会开自动挡的车。

en: I am Finnish, but I speak also Swedish.
zh: 我是芬兰人，但我也会说瑞典语。

en: They paid separately.
zh: 他们各自付账。

en: The housekeeper interrupted the conversation.
zh: 管家打断了谈话。

en: This shirt needs to be ironed.
zh: 这件衬衫需要熨一下。

en: This shirt needs ironing.
zh: 这件衬衫需要熨一下。

en: Could you wrap them up separately?
zh: 你能把它们分开包装吗？

en: What I need is a beer.
zh: 我需要的是一杯啤酒。

en: "Has anybody called the police?" "I have."
zh: “有人报警了吗？”“我报了。”

en: I enjoy feeding the pigeons.
zh: 我喜欢喂鸽子。

en: There are no drugs here.
zh: 这里没有毒品。

en: You do the kitchen.
zh: 你负责厨房。

en: We waited a long time, but she didn't show up.
zh: 我们等了很久，但她没有出现。

en: It's publicly recommended to "raise obedient kids," but it's rather difficult to carry that out.
zh: 公开场合都提倡“培养听话的孩子”，但实际上很难做到。

en: Whenever you come home late, your parents will start harping you on it, and you'll find it unbearable. No matter how late it gets, they'll stay up just to wait for you. They should just go to sleep already, don't you think?
zh: 每次你回家晚了，你的父母就会开始唠叨你，你会觉得无法忍受。无论多晚，他们都会熬夜等你。他们应该直接睡觉，你不觉得吗？

en: Whenever I come home late at night, my parents scold me and it annoys me. No matter how late I come back, they're awake and waiting for me. It would be so nice if they just went to sleep instead.
zh: 每当我深夜回家，我的父母就会责骂我，这让我很烦。无论我回来多晚，他们都醒着等我。如果他们直接睡觉就好了。

en: Is dad in the kitchen?
zh: 爸爸在厨房吗？

en: Her mother went to the United States to learn English.
zh: 她的母亲去美国学习英语。

en: Your hair is pretty.
zh: 你的头发很漂亮。

en: I was asleep when Mark arrived.
zh: 马克来的时候我正在睡觉。

en: The Joker is the wild card, OK?
zh: 小丑是百搭牌，明白了吗？

en: Does the Oedipus Complex apply to me, too? It sure doesn't feel like it, though.
zh: 俄狄浦斯情结也适用于我吗？ 虽然感觉不像。

en: The many oil fences that were used in the Gulf of Mexico got recycled for parts that are now used in electric cars.
zh: 墨西哥湾使用的许多石油围栏被回收利用，用于现在电动汽车的零件。

en: I got an ocarina from my daughter on Father's Day. Frankly, though, I don't need it. I wonder where she could have come up with such a present.
zh: 父亲节我女儿送了我一个陶笛。 但坦率地说，我不需要它。 我想知道她是怎么想到这样的礼物的。

en: I couldn't tell what kind of person this girl I met on the internet was from her profile, but something about her still piqued my curiosity, as though I had met her in a previous life, or something occult-ish like that, anyways.
zh: 我无法从我在网上认识的这个女孩的个人资料中判断她是什么样的人，但她身上的某些东西仍然激起了我的好奇心，好像我在前世见过她一样，或者类似神秘的东西。

en: If I change key, I can't hold the pitch. It's better if we go with the original key, and I sometimes sing an octave lower.
zh: 如果我变调，我就无法保持音高。 如果我们用原来的调比较好，我有时会低八度唱歌。

en: Naomi fell in the orchestra pit during her performance and broke her arm.
zh: 娜奥米在演出时掉进了乐池，摔断了胳膊。

en: There were a lot of Australian teachers at the English conversation school I went to previously.
zh: 我以前去的英语会话学校有很多澳大利亚老师。

en: There were a lot of teachers from Australia and New Zealand at the English conversation school I went to previously.
zh: 我以前去的英语会话学校有很多来自澳大利亚和新西兰的老师。

en: My specialty is French onion gratin soup.
zh: 我的特长是法式洋葱焗汤。

en: It was 30% off during the sale.
zh: 打折期间打了七折。

en: The CEO doesn't take his cellphone when he's not working.
zh: CEO不工作的时候不带手机。

en: An offside... No! We did it-!
zh: 越位了...不！我们成功了！

en: Let's add ambiguous sentences more often.
zh: 我们更频繁地添加有歧义的句子吧。

en: It's presumptuous to say that it's "production". Isn't it more processing?
zh: 说它是“生产”太冒昧了吧。 这不是更像是处理吗？

en: Playing, such as crumpling paper into a ball or tearing into pieces, helps develop children's creativity.
zh: 玩耍，例如把纸揉成一团或撕成碎片，有助于培养孩子的创造力。

en: I never want to see his face again, so I tore all of his pictures into pieces and burned them.
zh: 我再也不想看到他的脸了，所以我把他的所有照片都撕成碎片并烧掉了。

en: What should I do! I mistook my father's company documents for trash and crumpled them!
zh: 我该怎么办！我把父亲公司的文件误当成垃圾揉成一团了！

en: It's still being tested.
zh: 它仍在测试中。

en: I'll look it over later.
zh: 我稍后会查看它。

en: I want to style my hair so it's fluffy and feels snug.
zh: 我想把我的头发弄得蓬松，感觉很舒适。

en: The world is harsh.
zh: 世界是残酷的。

en: Nobody lives forever.
zh: 没有人能永远活着。

en: If you don't fold your clothes or hang them, they will be wrinkled.
zh: 如果你不叠衣服或挂起来，它们就会起皱。

en: Don't ask the same thing over and over again. I explained it properly to you already. It's getting tedious.
zh: 不要一遍又一遍地问同样的事情。 我已经好好地向你解释过了。 这让人感到厌烦。

en: Is there gas inside the car?
zh: 车里有汽油吗？

en: I wonder how figure-skaters are able to keep from being dizzy when they spin really fast.
zh: 我很奇怪花样滑冰运动员在快速旋转时是如何保持不头晕的。

en: Japan's prime ministers change rapidly so I can't really remember each of their names.
zh: 日本首相更替很快，所以我记不住每个人的名字。

en: The doctor sent the live patient to the morgue.
zh: 医生把活着的病人送到了太平间。

en: It's polite to say "itadakimasu" before eating one's meal.
zh: 吃饭前说“我开动了”是一种礼貌。

en: It's polite to say "Bon apétit" before eating one's meal.
zh: 吃饭前说“Bon appétit”是一种礼貌。

en: After finishing eating, one must say, "Thanks for the food."
zh: 吃完饭后，必须说“谢谢你的食物”。

en: "Look at the time! I'm gonna be late for school! Bye!" "See you later. Be careful."
zh: “看看时间！我要上学迟到了！再见！”“回头见。小心点。”

en: Business is business!
zh: 公事公办！

en: Even though she's allergic, I gave an egg to the child.
zh: 即使她过敏，我还是给了孩子一个鸡蛋。

en: I fell and broke my arm.
zh: 我摔倒了，胳膊摔断了。

en: Don't mess around and finish your meal quickly.
zh: 别胡闹，快点吃完饭。

en: Before you go play, do your homework.
zh: 去玩之前，先把作业做了。

en: We are learning Arabic.
zh: 我们正在学习阿拉伯语。

en: The rescue operation was called "Operation Tomodachi".
zh: 救援行动被称为“朋友行动”。

en: Again, it's not a musical, it's an operetta!
zh: 再说一遍，这不是音乐剧，是轻歌剧！

en: It said "Oracle Master," so I thought it was something related to spirits, but no, it was only about computers. Boring.
zh: 上面写着“Oracle Master”，所以我以为是和灵魂有关的东西，结果不是，只是关于电脑的。真无聊。

en: "What anthropoid would your girlfriend be most like?" "What a question... Well, um... An orangutan, I guess."
zh: “你觉得你女朋友最像什么类人猿？”“这是什么问题……嗯……我想是猩猩吧。”

en: I can't believe I didn't notice the earthquake in my sleep.
zh: 我真不敢相信我睡觉时没注意到地震。

en: Fever is one of the body's defence mechanisms.
zh: 发烧是身体的防御机制之一。

en: Only when I got sick as a kid that I could eat as much ice cream and jello as I wanted and not get yelled at.
zh: 只有在我小时候生病的时候，我才能想吃多少冰淇淋和果冻就吃多少，而且不会被骂。

en: Don't just sleep all day like some lion from the zoo. How about you go and clean up your room?
zh: 别像动物园里的狮子一样整天睡觉。你不如去打扫你的房间怎么样？

en: There was a violent tremor during the night, so I was scared and couldn't sleep very well.
zh: 夜里发生了剧烈的震动，所以我很害怕，睡不好。

en: I think that my costume for the upcoming Halloween party will be wrapping myself up in toilet paper like a mummy.
zh: 我想我即将到来的万圣节派对的服装是用卫生纸把自己裹成木乃伊。

en: I went around Hokkaido by bike this summer.
zh: 今年夏天我骑自行车环游了北海道。

en: We've walked all around the lake.
zh: 我们绕湖走了一圈。

en: I thought my son was being quite sneaky lately. Sure enough, I spotted him uploading a picture of himself cross-dressing and in makeup to a blog.
zh: 我最近觉得我儿子鬼鬼祟祟的。果不其然，我发现他把自己男扮女装、化了妆的照片上传到了博客上。

en: As the room fall silent, only the ticking sound of an old clock could be heard.
zh: 房间里一片寂静，只能听到老钟的滴答声。

en: Don't touch the container with the forbidden flies.
zh: 不要碰那个装有禁忌苍蝇的容器。

en: He severely criticized the mayor.
zh: 他严厉地批评了市长。

en: Junko is a beautiful girl.
zh: 纯子是个漂亮的女孩。

en: Starting today, I'll save all my small change so I can buy some new game software.
zh: 从今天开始，我要把所有的零钱都存起来，这样我就可以买一些新的游戏软件了。

en: No matter what you're studying, I think it's best to study a little every day.
zh: 无论你学什么，我认为最好每天都学一点。

en: The clicking of high heels kind of hurts my ears. Do the people wearing them not notice?
zh: 高跟鞋的声音有点刺耳。穿高跟鞋的人没注意到吗？

en: I was surprised that her hobby was karate. She always wears cute clothes.
zh: 我很惊讶她的爱好是空手道。她总是穿着可爱的衣服。

en: I can't walk anymore, Dad! Carry me, please!
zh: 爸爸，我走不动了！背我，求你了！

en: Daddy, I can't walk any more. Could you give me a piggyback ride?
zh: 爸爸，我走不动了。你能背我吗？

en: Daddy, I can't walk any more. Carry me.
zh: 爸爸，我走不动了。背我。

en: The thief ran quickly.
zh: 小偷跑得很快。

en: Where did Joe go?
zh: 乔去哪儿了？

en: I'm so lost.
zh: 我迷路了。

en: Is the entry form not working or is my Internet connection not working right?
zh: 是报名表有问题，还是我的网络连接有问题？

en: I just did a test and it's a bit slow but working fine.
zh: 我刚刚做了一个测试，有点慢，但工作正常。

en: Which browser are you using?
zh: 你用的是哪个浏览器？

en: My legs are weak.
zh: 我的腿软了。

en: Magazines let writers write what they want and decide how to lay it out afterward, but that magazine prioritizes its design, so it sets a predetermined limit on how many words are in it.
zh: 杂志让作者写他们想写的东西，并决定之后如何排版，但那本杂志优先考虑它的设计，所以它对其中的字数设置了一个预先确定的限制。

en: It's because I found out that giving my all won't accomplish anything significant. I miss the good old days where I could just believe in myself.
zh: 因为我发现付出一切也无法完成任何有意义的事情。我怀念那些我可以相信自己的美好时光。

en: The two lovers who eloped were crucified.
zh: 私奔的两个恋人被钉在十字架上。

en: The crime of adultery was abolished in 1947.
zh: 通奸罪于1947年被废除。

en: If you go into the forest, watch out for the man-eating ogres!
zh: 如果你进入森林，小心吃人的食人魔！

en: If you go into the forest, watch out for the ogres who eat children!
zh: 如果你进入森林，小心吃小孩的食人魔！

en: Who gave you such a rough time, and where? I'll beat him black and blue for you.
zh: 谁把你欺负成这样，在哪儿？我替你把他打得鼻青脸肿。

en: Today's stew has been carefully and slowly boiled to perfect deliciousness.
zh: 今天的炖汤是精心慢炖的，味道好极了。

en: Don't get such a big head just because you won the tournament. There's many others in the world who are just as good as you.
zh: 别因为赢了比赛就翘尾巴。这世界上还有很多和你一样优秀的人。

en: I was getting close to the summit, but there were several boulders in my way, and trying to get over them almost did me in. Sometimes there were loose rocks all over the place, too.
zh: 我当时都快到山顶了，但是有好几块巨石挡住了我的路，想翻过去差点要了我的命。有时候到处都是松动的石头。

en: I really like the crisp texture of gizzards.
zh: 我特别喜欢胗那种脆脆的口感。

en: This city may be a little run-down, but the people living here are all kind, and will welcome anyone with open arms.
zh: 这座城市可能有点破旧，但是住在这里的人都很友善，会热情地欢迎任何人。

en: I don't like messy places like this. I'd rather live somewhere clean and peaceful.
zh: 我不喜欢这种乱糟糟的地方。我宁愿住在干净又安静的地方。

en: There are many cute children in the world.
zh: 世界上有很多可爱的小孩。

en: I have changed my mind.
zh: 我改变主意了。

en: Do I really have to give a speech?
zh: 我真的必须要做演讲吗？

en: I don't like this plain necktie. Please show me a more colourful one.
zh: 我不喜欢这条素色的领带。请给我看看颜色更鲜艳的。

en: This novel isn't as good as his last one.
zh: 这本小说不如他上一本好。

en: I thought it was absurd that you got punished.
zh: 我觉得你受到惩罚很荒谬。

en: This box is too heavy for me to carry.
zh: 这个箱子太重了，我搬不动。

en: Please forget about the orienteering that you did at that outdoors school. Well, actually, you don't have to forget it, but the orienteering that we're doing here is completely different.
zh: 请忘记你在那个户外学校做的定向越野吧。嗯，其实，你不必忘记它，但是我们在这里做的定向越野是完全不同的。

en: Please, get in, sir.
zh: 先生，请进。

en: I know nothing about constellations. I can only recognize Orion and Cassiopeia. Oh, and the Big Dipper, too.
zh: 我对星座一无所知。我只能认出猎户座和仙后座。哦，还有北斗七星。

en: My grandmother cannot see.
zh: 我的奶奶看不见。

en: I found my boyfriend's favorite Beatles song playing from a music box. I'll be so happy to give it to him.
zh: 我发现我男朋友最喜欢的披头士乐队的歌正在一个音乐盒里播放。我会很高兴把它送给他。

en: I try to watch live TV as much as possible instead of recordings.
zh: 我尽量多看直播电视，而不是录播。

en: This fantasy book is a succession of really flashy magical spells and that makes it boring instead.
zh: 这本奇幻小说就是一连串华而不实的魔法咒语，反而让人觉得无聊。

en: Try some of this cake.
zh: 尝尝这块蛋糕。

en: These donuts, the outside breaks apart easily and the insides are light and fluffy, delicious!
zh: 这些甜甜圈，外面轻轻一碰就碎，里面又轻又蓬松，真好吃！

en: I have ten pens more than you do.
zh: 我比你多十支笔。

en: He was bewildered.
zh: 他感到很困惑。

en: He was perplexed.
zh: 他感到很困惑。

en: I wish I had a beautiful girlfriend.
zh: 我希望我能有个漂亮的女朋友。

en: I think my girlfriend is kind of cute.
zh: 我觉得我女朋友挺可爱的。

en: Tom's new girlfriend is quite attractive.
zh: 汤姆的新女朋友非常迷人。

en: I can't understand her way of thinking at all.
zh: 我完全无法理解她的思维方式。

en: What are you crying for?
zh: 你哭什么呢？

en: Let's dance.
zh: 我们跳舞吧。

en: It's time for us to go.
zh: 我们该走了。

en: It's almost time to go.
zh: 差不多该走了。

en: It would be nice to spend the summer in the mountains.
zh: 在山上度过夏天会很不错。

en: It never occurred to me that I might be wrong.
zh: 我从来没想过我可能是错的。

en: If there's anything I can do to help, please let me know.
zh: 如果有什么我可以帮忙的，请告诉我。

en: I'll give it a try.
zh: 我会试一试。

en: I'll be in touch.
zh: 我会保持联系。

en: I won't be getting married this year. In fact, I may never get married.
zh: 我今年不会结婚。事实上，我可能永远都不会结婚。

en: I need to go home.
zh: 我需要回家了。

en: I have many friends I can talk to.
zh: 我有很多可以倾诉的朋友。

en: I don't want to give up.
zh: 我不想放弃。

en: How was your trip?
zh: 你的旅行怎么样？

en: He intends to visit his uncle.
zh: 他打算去看望他的叔叔。

en: He's considering visiting his uncle.
zh: 他正在考虑去看望他的叔叔。

en: In other words, he's lazy.
zh: 换句话说，他很懒。

en: Who knows what we'll find up in the attic?
zh: 谁知道我们会在阁楼上发现什么？

en: From 1988 to 1994 he lived in Lebanon.
zh: 从1988年到1994年，他住在黎巴嫩。

en: No sugar for you?
zh: 你不加糖吗？

en: Don't leave me out in the cold, come on.
zh: 别把我晾在外面，拜托。

en: I was fired.
zh: 我被解雇了。

en: The travel agent suggested that we take some traveler's checks with us.
zh: 旅行社建议我们带一些旅行支票。

en: I like watermelon.
zh: 我喜欢西瓜。

en: What scared Tom the most was the thought that he might not be able to walk again.
zh: 最让汤姆害怕的是他可能再也无法走路的想法。

en: Tom would say yes.
zh: 汤姆会说是的。

en: Tom would like some coffee.
zh: 汤姆想来点咖啡。

en: Tom watches too much television.
zh: 汤姆电视看太多了。

en: Tom wasn't the only one who showed up late.
zh: 汤姆不是唯一一个迟到的人。

en: Tom was wrong.
zh: 汤姆错了。

en: Tom was very lucky.
zh: 汤姆非常幸运。

en: Tom was totally wasted.
zh: 汤姆完全喝醉了。

en: Tom was tall and handsome.
zh: 汤姆又高又帅。

en: Tom was shocked.
zh: 汤姆很震惊。

en: Tom was shivering with cold.
zh: 汤姆冷得直哆嗦。

en: Tom was scared.
zh: 汤姆很害怕。

en: Tom was relieved to hear that.
zh: 汤姆听到这个消息松了一口气。

en: Tom was my first boyfriend.
zh: 汤姆是我的初恋男友。

en: Tom was kidnapped.
zh: 汤姆被绑架了。

en: Tom was John's roommate.
zh: 汤姆是约翰的室友。

en: Tom was in the shower.
zh: 汤姆在洗澡。

en: Tom was hurt.
zh: 汤姆受伤了。

en: Tom was hung up on Mary.
zh: 汤姆对玛丽念念不忘。

en: Tom was hoping that Mary would kiss him.
zh: 汤姆希望玛丽会吻他。

en: Tom was here yesterday.
zh: 汤姆昨天在这里。

en: Tom was happy.
zh: 汤姆很高兴。

en: Tom was frightened.
zh: 汤姆很害怕。

en: Tom was fast asleep.
zh: 汤姆睡得很熟。

en: Tom wants to marry Mary.
zh: 汤姆想和玛丽结婚。

en: Tom wants to know your opinion.
zh: 汤姆想知道你的意见。

en: Tom wants a microscope.
zh: 汤姆想要一个显微镜。

en: Tom wanted to wash his hands.
zh: 汤姆想洗手。

en: Tom turned on the TV.
zh: 汤姆打开了电视。

en: Tom turned on the heater.
zh: 汤姆打开了暖气。

en: Tom tried to kiss Mary.
zh: 汤姆试图亲吻玛丽。

en: Tom took the wrong train.
zh: 汤姆坐错了火车。

en: Tom took Mary home.
zh: 汤姆送玛丽回家了。

en: Tom threw his back out.
zh: 汤姆扭伤了背。

en: Tom thought it was unfair.
zh: 汤姆认为这不公平。

en: Tom thought he would be late.
zh: 汤姆认为他会迟到。

en: Tom thinks you're lying.
zh: 汤姆认为你在撒谎。

en: Tom thinks there's hope.
zh: 汤姆认为还有希望。

en: Tom thinks that's normal.
zh: 汤姆认为那是正常的。

en: Tom talked in his sleep.
zh: 汤姆说梦话。

en: Tom stood in line.
zh: 汤姆排队站着。

en: Tom started crying.
zh: 汤姆开始哭了。

en: Tom squeezed Mary's hand.
zh: 汤姆握紧了玛丽的手。

en: Tom split up with Mary.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽分手了。

en: Tom speaks French fluently.
zh: 汤姆法语说得很流利。

en: Tom soaked in the bathtub.
zh: 汤姆泡在浴缸里。

en: Tom says he understands how you feel.
zh: 汤姆说他理解你的感受。

en: Tom said he'd pay for the entire thing.
zh: 汤姆说他会支付全部费用。

en: Tom is taking the day off today.
zh: 汤姆今天休息一天。

en: Tom is probably right.
zh: 汤姆可能是对的。

en: Tom is fluent in French.
zh: 汤姆法语很流利。

en: Tom inherited all of his father's property.
zh: 汤姆继承了他父亲的所有财产。

en: Tom asked for directions.
zh: 汤姆问路了。

en: Tom and Mary both wanted to be astronauts.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都想成为宇航员。

en: It's possible that Tom lied to you.
zh: 汤姆有可能对你撒谎了。

en: How old do you think Tom is?
zh: 你觉得汤姆多大了？

en: Here, let me take a stab at it.
zh: 来，我来试试。

en: I abstain from alcohol.
zh: 我不喝酒。

en: I may be unsociable, but it doesn't mean I don't talk to people.
zh: 我可能不善交际，但这并不意味着我不和人说话。

en: Nobody has ever done that.
zh: 从来没有人做过那件事。

en: Today isn't my lucky day!
zh: 今天真倒霉！

en: I was just about to go to bed when he phoned me.
zh: 我正要睡觉，他就打电话给我了。

en: I got a phone call from him just as I was about to go to bed.
zh: 我正要睡觉的时候，接到了他的电话。

en: My grandmother's mother is my "great grandmother," so my great grandmother's mother is my "great great grandmother"? Is that right?
zh: 我奶奶的妈妈是我的“曾祖母”，那么我曾祖母的妈妈是我的“老祖母”吗？对吗？

en: I can't imagine a world without electricity.
zh: 我无法想象一个没有电的世界。

en: We should help each other in times of need.
zh: 我们应该在困难的时候互相帮助。

en: I could tell from his accent that he was a Frenchman.
zh: 我从他的口音听出他是法国人。

en: Is there an elevator here?
zh: 这里有电梯吗？

en: Do you have an elevator?
zh: 你们有电梯吗？

en: I'll do any kind of work.
zh: 我什么样的工作都做。

en: I like cold milk, but not hot milk. The white membrane and the smell that develops bothers me.
zh: 我喜欢冷牛奶，但不喜欢热牛奶。我讨厌热牛奶上面的那层膜和味道。

en: What time do you usually eat breakfast?
zh: 你通常几点吃早饭？

en: Tom is a confirmed bachelor.
zh: 汤姆是个铁杆单身汉。

en: You can't judge a person based on clothing.
zh: 人不可貌相。

en: Don't be so hard on yourself.
zh: 别对自己太苛刻。

en: We had hoped some students would come, but there was no one in the classroom.
zh: 我们曾希望有些学生会来，但是教室里一个人也没有。

en: Tom couldn't find a decent job in Boston, so he moved to Chicago.
zh: 汤姆在波士顿找不到一份像样的工作，所以他搬到了芝加哥。

en: If you want your workers to be happy, you need to pay them a decent wage.
zh: 如果你想让你的员工开心，你需要支付他们体面的工资。

en: It's been a while. How are you?
zh: 好久不见，你好吗？

en: I have the feeling that my French is improving slowly.
zh: 我感觉我的法语正在慢慢进步。

en: If you truly want to upgrade your language skills, then translation might not be the best way to do it, but you're really just playing around, so I believe that if you find it fun, then more power to you.
zh: 如果你真的想提高你的语言技能，那么翻译可能不是最好的方法，但你真的只是在玩玩而已，所以我相信如果你觉得有趣，那就去做吧。

en: Do you have any recommendations for something to read on Aozora Bunko?
zh: 你有什么关于在青空文库上阅读的书籍的推荐吗？

en: No fussing!
zh: 别吵吵闹闹的！

en: But you see, while other people may not know, in my case, if I just had the time, I'd be buried over my head in things I'd want to do. I don't have the time to not think about things I need or want.
zh: 但是你看，虽然其他人可能不知道，但在我的情况下，如果我只是有时间，我就会埋头于我想做的事情。我没有时间不去想我需要或想要的东西。

en: It was not my mistake.
zh: 这不是我的错。

en: It wasn't my mistake.
zh: 这不是我的错。

en: That doesn't mean that I'll stop doing it.
zh: 这并不意味着我会停止做这件事。

en: I did that without consulting anyone.
zh: 我没跟任何人商量就做了这件事。

en: I did that without asking for anyone's advice.
zh: 我没征求任何人的意见就做了这件事。

en: I did that without consulting anybody.
zh: 我没跟任何人商量就做了这件事。

en: Tom will help you if you ask.
zh: 如果你问汤姆，他会帮助你的。

en: Tom will help you if you ask him to.
zh: 如果你请汤姆帮忙，他会帮助你的。

en: Tom will help you if you ask him.
zh: 如果你请汤姆帮忙，他会帮助你的。

en: Look, it's snowing!
zh: 看，下雪了！

en: We just played doctor.
zh: 我们只是在玩过家家。

en: I'm here on business.
zh: 我是来出差的。

en: I'm here for work.
zh: 我是来工作的。

en: You have a nice complexion.
zh: 你的气色真好。

en: Tom still lives with his parents.
zh: 汤姆还和他父母住在一起。

en: How is your wife doing?
zh: 你妻子怎么样了？

en: How old do I look?
zh: 你看我多大？

en: In what month were you guys born?
zh: 你们是几月出生的？

en: I'm not twenty years old yet.
zh: 我还没满二十岁。

en: Do you have an elevator in your house?
zh: 你家有电梯吗？

en: I ate at the side of my friend.
zh: 我在我朋友旁边吃了东西。

en: Don't make me wait!
zh: 别让我等！

en: I want it.
zh: 我想要它。

en: A Noldo is beneath the tree.
zh: 一个诺多族人站在树下。

en: Walls have ears.
zh: 隔墙有耳。

en: Is this translation correct?
zh: 这个翻译正确吗？

en: I sing now.
zh: 我现在唱歌。

en: I think Tom hasn't left yet.
zh: 我觉得汤姆还没走。

en: What should I do in order to save time?
zh: 我应该怎么做才能节省时间？

en: What should I do to save time?
zh: 我应该怎么做才能节省时间？

en: He couldn't stand being away from his girlfriend.
zh: 他受不了离开他女朋友。

en: I'll go on Sunday.
zh: 我星期天去。

en: Today is Thursday.
zh: 今天星期四。

en: Michael is reading a book.
zh: 迈克尔在看书。

en: He never forgot his ambition to become a leading politician.
zh: 他从未忘记他成为一名杰出政治家的雄心壮志。

en: He thinks I love her.
zh: 他以为我爱她。

en: There is no other choice.
zh: 没有别的选择。

en: Come to help me.
zh: 过来帮我。

en: Come help me.
zh: 过来帮我。

en: Come with me, please.
zh: 请跟我来。

en: My brother is in Australia now.
zh: 我哥哥现在在澳大利亚。

en: My house is on a hill.
zh: 我的房子在山上。

en: No, I'm not well.
zh: 不，我不太舒服。

en: It's great that my nephew and niece came over to play, but they're so annoying making such a racket running all over the house all day that I can't stand it.
zh: 侄子侄女来玩当然很好，但他们一整天在房子里跑来跑去，吵吵闹闹的，真是烦死我了。

en: I expect everyday is chaos for families with small children.
zh: 我估计每天对有小孩的家庭来说都是一片混乱。

en: I have horrible morning sickness. I can't eat anything.
zh: 我的孕吐很厉害，什么都吃不下。

en: You're one stubbornly indecisive guy, you know that? If you have something to say to me, say it now, and clearly.
zh: 你真是个顽固不决的人，你知道吗？如果你有什么话要对我说，现在就说，而且要说清楚。

en: When I lifted a potted plant in my garden, there were swarms of little insects crawling underneath, and I instinctively let out a shriek.
zh: 当我在花园里抬起一盆盆栽时，下面爬满了小虫子，我本能地尖叫了一声。

en: I’m glad I had a thoroughly open and honest talk with him. I feel so relieved.
zh: 我很高兴和他进行了一次彻底坦诚的谈话，我感觉如释重负。

en: Because of yesterday's heavy snow, the ground is very slippery. As soon as I stepped outside, I slipped and fell on my bottom.
zh: 因为昨天下了大雪，地上很滑。我一出门就滑倒，摔了个屁股墩儿。

en: I was looking forward to seeing a scenic view of Mt. Fuji, but unfortunately it was completely hidden behind clouds.
zh: 我本来很期待看到富士山的壮丽景色，但不幸的是，它完全被云层遮挡住了。

en: I have absolutely no clue what happened after I got drunk. Why is there some old dude sleeping in my room?
zh: 我完全不知道喝醉后发生了什么。为什么有个老头睡在我的房间里？

en: Due to the typhoon, the train schedule was disturbed and all the trains were jam-packed.
zh: 由于台风的影响，列车时刻表被打乱，所有的火车都挤满了人。

en: This girl is still in elementary school, yet she has a wine-tasting master license. I didn't know one could get qualified without even drinking alcohol.
zh: 这个女孩还在上小学，却有品酒师执照。我都不知道不喝酒也能获得资格。

en: You don't have the guts.
zh: 你没那个胆量。

en: You don't have what it takes to be a leader.
zh: 你没有成为领导者的能力。

en: Check out that woman!
zh: 看看那个女人！

en: Even though I summoned my courage and invited Mary to a movie, she gave me the slip.
zh: 即使我鼓起勇气邀请玛丽去看电影，她还是溜走了。

en: Even though I plucked up courage to invite Mary to a film, she stood me up.
zh: 即使我鼓起勇气邀请玛丽去看电影，她还是放了我鸽子。

en: The racket slipped from my hands and broke itself on the court when I made the serve.
zh: 我发球的时候，球拍从我手中滑落，在球场上摔坏了。

en: I don't have much interest in sports games like soccer or baseball, but I do like seeing weird or outstanding plays in them.
zh: 我对足球或棒球之类的体育比赛不太感兴趣，但我喜欢看比赛中出现的奇怪或精彩的瞬间。

en: I was going to take a picture of a squirrel I found in the park, but it was too nimble, and all my shots were no good.
zh: 我本来想拍一张在公园里发现的松鼠的照片，但它太敏捷了，我拍的照片都不好。

en: Motorbikes are nice. You can move smoothly even through a traffic jam.
zh: 摩托车很好。即使在交通堵塞的情况下，你也能顺利行驶。

en: Motorcycles are great. They can easily get through even in heavy traffic.
zh: 摩托车很棒。即使在交通拥堵的情况下，它们也能轻松通过。

en: Penguins look strange when they waddle on land, but the way they swim so smoothly through the water is pretty cool.
zh: 企鹅在陆地上摇摇摆摆的样子看起来很奇怪，但它们在水中流畅游泳的方式非常酷。

en: Takashi said he wasn't afraid of ghosts, but when he heard some sounds from the supposedly empty second floor, he quickly scrambled away.
zh: 高志说他不怕鬼，但是当他听到一些来自据说是空无一物的二楼的声音时，他迅速逃走了。

en: The only thing he did before he briskly went on ahead was give us a map. The remainder of us could only rely on the map to figure out where to go.
zh: 他匆匆往前走之前做的唯一一件事就是给我们一张地图。我们剩下的人只能依靠地图来弄清楚该往哪里走。

en: He just gave us a map and sprinted ahead. We who were left behind had to go on with just the map to rely on.
zh: 他只是给了我们一张地图就飞奔走了。我们这些被留下的人只能靠着地图继续前进。

en: Even though our house was on TV, I'd prefer it if you wouldn't just barge in our garden and take pictures.
zh: 即使我们的房子上了电视，我还是希望你不要直接闯入我们的花园拍照。

en: Emiko never thinks about others' feelings and always says things too bluntly, so everyone hates her.
zh: 惠美子从不考虑别人的感受，总是说话太直白，所以每个人都讨厌她。

en: My son likes books about animals.
zh: 我儿子喜欢关于动物的书。

en: Don't sniffle, please quickly blow your nose.
zh: 别抽鼻子了，请赶快擤鼻涕。

en: According to her, he is a coward.
zh: 据她说，他是个懦夫。

en: According to my teacher, I'm a good pupil.
zh: 据我的老师说，我是一个好学生。

en: In my opinion, he is just a fool.
zh: 在我看来，他只是个傻瓜。

en: Tom scrubbed his feet.
zh: 汤姆擦洗了他的脚。

en: I can't keep up with you. Could you dictate a bit slower?
zh: 我跟不上你。你能说慢一点吗？

en: Tom set a trap.
zh: 汤姆设了个陷阱。

en: Tom set me up.
zh: 汤姆陷害了我。

en: Tom ruined my weekend.
zh: 汤姆毁了我的周末。

en: I don't want either of them.
zh: 我两个都不想要。

en: Give me five minutes to finish the last adjustments.
zh: 给我五分钟来完成最后的调整。

en: There are many slums in Mexico.
zh: 墨西哥有很多贫民窟。

en: You mistook the salt for sugar and put it in your coffee?! How careless can you get?
zh: 你把盐当成糖放进咖啡里了？！你怎么这么粗心？

en: Not even going to work, do you want to keep living like this?
zh: 连工作都不去，你想一直这样生活下去吗？

en: The unkempt girl was completely unable to keep things neat and tidy.
zh: 那个不修边幅的女孩完全无法保持整洁。

en: I think that there are more people in the countryside with a big heart than there are in the city.
zh: 我认为乡下人比城市里的人更有爱心。
